title: Uta no☆Prince-sama♪: Maji Love 1000% (Uta no Prince Sama)
synopsis: Haruka Nanami, an aspiring composer from the countryside, longs to write music for her beloved idol, Hayato Ichinose. Determined to accomplish this goal, she enrolls into Saotome Academy, a highly regarded vocational school for the performing arts.
characters: ['Ichinose, Tokiya', 'Ittoki, Otoya', 'Kurusu, Shou', 'Jinguuji, Ren', 'Hijirikawa, Masato', 'Shinomiya, Natsuki', 'Nanami, Haruka', 'Aijima, Cecil', 'Tsukimiya, Ringo', 'Saotome, Shining']
